Text:
Why don't you put a whole bunch of set into a single release? It would be easier for everyone and you would not clutter the list with teensy tiny torrents. You have split less than 160 MB of material into 20 very small parts. 

Please, do not compress such small files. It is useless and annoying especially since you don't show previews.
overlaod extremes. Nice title, but WHAT is overload. Maybe many small files....!
